page.title: 14A HIGH SALVINGTON RESIDENT
page.content: I get up at 9am on Saturday,have breakfast,then go into Worthing for shopping as the only shop in our area is expensive.We only use it for 'top-up' supplies.After lunch,I go for a walk over the Downs,the path being 20m away from our house.Then I go back home to watch television.This area is ideal for my friends and me to enjoy the traffic-free safety of the unspoilt countryside.After watching television until 4.30pm,I cycle down Salvington Hill to the A27,through Durrington down to Offington where my friend lives-a dangerous route with much traffic.I get home around 7pm, have tea,watch television until 10pm, and then to bed.I cannot hear much traffic through my bedroom window, only countryside sounds.
